class.name: DojoController
class.brief_description: A controller class for managing Dojo accounts and interactions.
class.description: The DojoController class provides methods to manage Dojo accounts, including initialization, execution of calls, and handling of account details.

method.name: address
method.description: Returns the address of the controller account.

method.name: app_id
method.description: Returns the application ID associated with the controller.

method.name: chain_id
method.description: Returns the chain ID of the network the controller is connected to.

method.name: clear_last_error
method.description: Clears the last error message stored in the controller.

method.name: error_message
method.description: Returns the last error message, if any.

method.name: execute_raw
method.description: Executes a raw call to a contract.

method.name: from_storage
method.description: Creates a DojoController instance from storage using the application ID.

method.name: get_info
method.description: Returns a dictionary containing information about the controller, such as address, app_id, chain_id, delegate_account, and username.

method.name: is_valid
method.description: Checks if the controller is valid (initialized).

method.name: new_headless
method.description: Creates a new headless DojoController instance.

method.name: switch_chain
method.description: Switches the chain to the specified RPC URL.

method.name: transfer
method.description: Transfers an amount to a recipient.

method.name: username
method.description: Returns the username associated with the controller.
